description: This pack includes a costume for Lydie based on the outfit of Marie from the very first Atelier title, "Atelier Marie: The Alchemist of Salburg", and a costume for Suelle based on the outfit of Elie from "Atelier Elie: The Alchemist of Salburg 2".  Now the twins can look like true Salburg alchemists!
name: Atelier Lydie & Suelle: Marie & Elie Dress Up Costumes
